title: Could i request a PBE account?
body: I feel like i am the perfect candidate for testing out the next patch. I have been both a Katarina and a Talon main for 3 seasons and have 500-1000 games on each champion and have seperatly reached diamond 1/master  on them. Since i don't think i signed up for the pbe in time, is there a way i could request an account from riot directly?

replies.body:
We can't manually review or give PBE access, but if you've already applied, I encourage you to continue to actively play the game and be a positive influence on the community.

If you'd like an in-depth look at how the PBE works and how we grant access, check out [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any other questions.
